00027 #include "btGImpactBvh.h"
00028 #include "btQuantization.h"
00029 
00032 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16     (struct) BT_QUANTIZED_BVH_NODE
00033 {
00034         //12 bytes
00035         unsigned short int      m_quantizedAabbMin[3];
00036         unsigned short int      m_quantizedAabbMax[3];
00037         //4 bytes
00038         int     m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00039 
00040         BT_QUANTIZED_BVH_NODE()
00041         {
00042                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = 0;
00043         }
00044 
00045         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isLeafNode() const
00046         {
00047                 //skipindex is negative (internal node), triangleindex >=0 (leafnode)
00048                 return (m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex>=0);
00049         }
00050 
00051         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getEscapeIndex() const
00052         {
00053                 //btAssert(m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex < 0);
00054                 return -m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00055         }
00056 
00057         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setEscapeIndex(int index)
00058         {
00059                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = -index;
00060         }
00061 
00062         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getDataIndex() const
00063         {
00064                 //btAssert(m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex >= 0);
00065 
00066                 return m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex;
00067         }
00068 
00069         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void setDataIndex(int index)
00070         {
00071                 m_escapeIndexOrDataIndex = index;
00072         }
00073 
00074         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool testQuantizedBoxOverlapp(
00075                 unsigned short * quantizedMin,unsigned short * quantizedMax) const
00076         {
00077                 if(m_quantizedAabbMin[0] > quantizedMax[0] ||
00078                    m_quantizedAabbMax[0] < quantizedMin[0] ||
00079                    m_quantizedAabbMin[1] > quantizedMax[1] ||
00080                    m_quantizedAabbMax[1] < quantizedMin[1] ||
00081                    m_quantizedAabbMin[2] > quantizedMax[2] ||
00082                    m_quantizedAabbMax[2] < quantizedMin[2])
00083                 {
00084                         return false;
00085                 }
00086                 return true;
00087         }
00088 
00089 };
00090
